# OptimizationError.unsupportedPlatform

**Case**

The optimization operation is not supported on this platform.

## Declaration

```swift
case unsupportedPlatform
```

## Analyzing the error

- **OptimizationError.numericOverflow**: Numerical overflow. Step size parameter may be too large.
- **OptimizationError.numericUnderflow**: Numerical underflow (not enough progress).
